title: By the King. A proclamation offering his Majesties gracious pardon to all officers, gunners, armourers, gunsmiths, carpenters, wheele-wrights, and other artificers belonging to the Office of the Ordinance, and requiring their attendance at Oxford, before the eighteenth day of this instant March.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
publisher: by Leonard Lichfield, Printer to the University,
